name: Deathblade
effect: On kill or assist, gain +15 attack.

name: Giant Slayer
effect: Basic attacks deal 8% of the target's current health as physical damage.

name: Hextech Gunblade
effect: Basic Attacks and spells heal for 25% of damage dealt.

name: Spear of Shojin
effect: After casting a spell, basic attacks restore 18% of maximum mana.

name: Guardian Angel
effect: When the wearer dies, revive with up to 400 health after a 2 second delay once per combat.

name: Bloodthirster
effect: Basic attacks heal for 40% of damage dealt.

name: Zeke's Herald
effect: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain +20% attack speed.

name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
effect: Wearer is also an Assassin.

name: Infinity Edge
effect: +125% critical strike damage.

name: Rapid Firecannon
effect: +100% Attack Range.

name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
effect: On basic attack, gain +4% bonus attack speed for the rest of combat.

name: Statikk Shiv
effect: On every third basic attack, deal 100 magical damage to 3 enemies.

name: Phantom Dancer
effect: Dodge all critical strikes.

name: Runaan's Hurricane
effect: Basic attacks fire an additional missile at another nearby enemy, dealing 60% of the wearer's attack damage and applying on-hit effects.

name: Titanic Hydra
effect: Basic attacks deal an additional 3% of the wearer's maximum health as magic damage to the target and adjacent enemies behind them.

name: Blade of the Ruined King
effect: Wearer is also a Blademaster.

name: Repeating Crossbow
effect: When the wearer dies, Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped to a new ally. Each time Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped, it grants a stacking +30% attack speed and +30% critical Strike chance for the remainder of combat.

name: Rabadon's Deathcap
effect: The wearer's spell power is +75% more effective.

name: Luden's Echo
effect: The wearer's spells deal 150 magic damage to the first target hit and up to 3 nearby enemies.

name: Locket of the Iron Solari
effect: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 300 damage for 8 seconds.

name: Ionic Spark
effect: Whenever an enemy casts a spell, the wearer deals 100 true damage to the caster.

name: Morellonomicon
effect: When the wearer deals damage with their spells, they burn the target, dealing 20% of the target's maximum health as true damage and preventing 80% of healing over 10 seconds. Unique.

name: Inferno's Cinder
effect: Wearer is also an Inferno.

name: Jeweled Guantlet
effect: The wearer's spells can critically strike.

name: Seraph's Embrace
effect: Gain 20 Mana after casting a spell.

name: Frozen Heart
effect: Reduces the Attack Speed of adjacent enemies by 25%.

name: Hush
effect: Basic Attacks have a 33% chance to silence the target, preventing the them from gaining mana for 4 seconds.

name: Redemption
effect: When the wearer falls below 30% health, nearby allies are healed for 1200 Health after a 2.5 second delay. This effect can trigger once per combat.

name: Mages Cap
effect: Wearer is also a Mage.

name: Hand of Justice
effect: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following: Basic attacks and spells deal +50.0% Damage, Basic attacks heal 50.0 Health on-hit

name: Thornmail
effect: When the wearer is hit by a Basic Attack, they reflect 100% of the mitigated damage as magic damage.

name: Sword Breaker
effect: Basic Attacks have a 33% chance to disarm the target for 3 seconds, preventing that enemy from Basic Attacking.

name: Red Buff
effect: Basic Attacks burn the target, dealing 20% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and preventing 80% of healing for the duration of the burn.

name: Warden's Mail
effect: Wearer is also a Warden.

name: Iceborn Guantlet
effect: When the wearer dodges, they create a zone of ice. Enemies inside the zone have their Attack Speed reduced by 25%.

name: Dragon's Claw
effect: Wearer gains 50% resistance to magic damage.

name: Zephyr
effect: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 6 seconds.

name: Talisman of Light
effect: Wearer is also a Light.

name: Quicksilver
effect: The wearer gains a shield that prevents the next crowd control effect from applying. This shield refreshes after 3 seconds.

name: Warmog's Armor
effect: The wearer regenerates 6% of their missing Health per second.

name: Frozen Mallet
effect: Wearer is also Glacial.

name: Trap Claw
effect: Grants a shield that blocks the first enemy spell that hits them. The enemy that breaks the shield is stunned for 4 seconds.

name: Force of Nature
effect: The wearer's team gains +1 maximum team size.

name: Berserker's Axe
effect: Wearer is also a Berserker.

name: Thief's Gloves
effect: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.
